str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a derivative of echo; a throng; by implication, the rabble; by extension, a class of people; figuratively, a riot.
When, whenever. From hote and an; whenever; also causatively inasmuch as.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A cloud. From nephos; properly, cloudiness, i.e. a cloud.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: To make to rise, I rise, shine (generally of the sun, and hence met.). From ana and the base of telos; to arise.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
A setting (of the sun), hence: the West. From duno; the sun-set, i.e. the western region.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
A violent rain, a shower. Of uncertain affinity; a thunder storm.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular

str2: Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
